title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including the types of infrastructure to be deployed (e.g., virtual machines, containers, networks, cloud resources), the competition formats to be supported (e.g., jeopardy-style, attack-defense, hybrid), the desired user experience (e.g., web interface, CLI, API), security considerations (e.g., isolation, access controls, data protection), scalability requirements (e.g., handling large numbers of participants, concurrent competitions), integration with existing systems (e.g., scoring engines, challenge repositories), and any other relevant aspects (e.g., logging, monitoring, reporting).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including the components, their interactions, and the technologies to be used. The architecture should consider scalability, maintainability, security, and performance requirements. Ensure proper separation of concerns and modular design for easy extensibility and future enhancements. The architecture should also address the following aspects: 1) Infrastructure provisioning and management, 2) Challenge hosting and deployment, 3) User management and authentication, 4) Scoring and leaderboard, 5) Administration and monitoring, 6) Security considerations (e.g., network isolation, access control, data encryption), 7) Logging and auditing, 8) Backup and disaster recovery.

title: Plan Infrastructure Deployment
description: Determine the infrastructure deployment strategy, including the cloud providers, automation tools, and configuration management approaches to be used.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including user flows, wireframes, mockups, and considering accessibility and responsive design.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including the API, business logic, and integration with infrastructure deployment tools.

title: Implement Frontend Application
description: Develop the frontend application for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including the user interface components and integration with the backend services.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including automated testing, building, and deployment.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including authentication, authorization, and secure communication protocols.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing of the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including functional, integration, and performance testing.

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the CTFInfrastructureManager system, including user guides, technical documentation, and deployment instructions.
